comments.body: Thinking about this more and I believe its best not make any changes to tests under `targets/nxos_nxapi` or `targets/nxos_nxapi/transports`.  We should still have some coverage for nxapi local until the code is removed from  `module_utils/nxos.py`.  These two test suites are specific to nxapi validation so these make sense to keep around.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +23,27 @@    register: result

  - include: tasks/platform/n7k/assert_changes_https.yaml
    when: platform is match('N7K')
